pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.1: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:5.1: 75. The training rule on defecating in water
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:6.2: At that time the monks from the group of six were defecating, urinating, and spitting in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:6.4: “How could the Sakyan ascetics defecate, urinate, and spit in water? They are just like lay people indulging in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.1: The monks heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.2: and the monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.4: “How can the monks from the group of six defecate, urinate, and spit in water?” …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.8: Foolish men, how can you defecate, urinate, and spit in water?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:7.10: And, monks, this training rule should be recited thus:
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:8.1: ‘“I will not defecate, urinate, or spit in water,” this is how you should train.’
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:9.1: In this way the Master laid down this training rule for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.1: Soon afterwards, being afraid of wrongdoing, sick monks did not defecate, urinate, or spit in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.3: Soon afterwards he gave a teaching and addressed the monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.4: “Monks, I allow a sick monk to defecate, urinate, or spit in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:10.5: And so, monks, this training rule should be recited thus:
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:11.1: ‘“When not sick, I will not defecate, urinate, or spit in water,” this is how you should train.’
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:12.1: If one is not sick, one should not defecate, urinate, or spit in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:12.2: If, out of disrespect, a monk who is not sick defecates, urinates, or spits in water, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:13.2: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:14.1: The fifteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:14.2: The seventh chapter on shoes is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:15.1: “Venerables, the rules on training have been recited.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:15.2: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:15.8: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:16.1: The chapter on training is finished.
